Back to Franz Liszt

Franz Liszt

Faribolo pastour, S. 236/1

1844 · LW A106 · R. 93

[IMSLP]

This is an arrangement of a song by Jacques Jasmi. It was originally published together with Chanson du Béarn (S. 236/2; LW A107; R. 94).

Recommended editions

  • New Liszt Edition (Editio Musica Budapest) · II/6 · Z. A/B 12395 · Free Arrangements VI · ed. László Martos / Imre Sulyok

Duration: 4' 30"

Difficulty: 4
